title: Mayo Says Banks `Part of Solution'
itunes:title: Mayo Says Banks `Part of Solution'
description:
Mike Mayo, Senior Analyst at Wells Fargo Securities, discusses his outlook for the banking sector amid the coronavirus outbreak. He explains why he thinks banks are more resilient than they've been in a decade.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
